Publication.title: The author?s software system for planning and selection of personnel in SME
Publication.abstractEnglish: The strategic management of intellectual capital involves rethinking how the companies creates value from a know-ledge-centric perspective and redesigning and orchestrating the role of staff knowledge in the firm?s strategy. This paper presents the author?s software system for facilitating decision making at a strategic level in terms of the profitability of investment in staff knowledge. This software is a computer implementation of the method for planning and selection of personnel in SME.
